title: Topless Kylie Jenner Thinks Smoking Makes Her Look *Really* Cool
text:
Gross.
Kylie Jenner continues to endorse smoking in her Instagram photos â€” and even if she doesn't light up cigs IRL, it's still such a terrible message to her young following!
On Wednesday, the 19-year-old posed topless in two black and white photos while puffing on what appears to be a hand-rolled cigarette (but it could be something else, TBH).
Related: Honey Boo Boo Professes Her Love For Kylie
